mapper.select: select t1.snid snid ,t2.tonnage past_tonnage,t1.tonnage now_tonnage,t2.gate_times past_gate_times,t1.gate_times now_gate_times,t2.ncls_crry_tns past_ncls_crry_tns,t1.ncls_crry_tns now_ncls_crry_tns,t2.crg_ddwght_tns past_crg_ddwght_tns,t1.crg_ddwght_tns now_crg_ddwght_tns,t2.cz_count past_cz_count,t1.cz_count now_cz_count,t2.act_fee_pd past_act_fee_pd,t1.act_fee_pd now_act_fee_pd from tdm_xj_lockage_info t1 left join tdm_xj_lockage_info t2 on t1.snid=t2.snid where t1.target='今年' and t2.target='去年'
